location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 77: Copy of a Statement Issued by the Court of Directors of the East India Company

mods.abstract: This item is a copy of a statement issued by the Court of Directors of the East India Company. The statement gives official notification of Rawson Hart Boddam's appointment as President and Governor of all affairs at Bombay. It makes reference to a recent Act of Parliament for the better regulation and management of the affairs of the East India Company. The original statement is attributed to Thomas Morton, Secretary to the Court of Directors.
